issue.title: [C++] Consider using Buffer for transpose maps in DictionaryType::Unify instead of std::vector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5343](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5343). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the spirit of "track all the allocations", if dictionaries have non-trivial length, we may want to account for this memory more precisely.
